definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: Candidates can be available during both shifts day and night.
sentences.chinese: 考生可同時可在白天和黑夜的變化。

sentences.english: The perceptual shape of the light appearing elusively in the dark, a unique charm of optic artistry.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜裏若隱若現的感性造型，獨具光影藝術魅力。

sentences.english: Whether day or night, summer or winter.
sentences.chinese: 不論白天黑夜，炎夏寒冬。

sentences.english: Kaen : hello darkness, my old friend.
No more of the Crows Crying at Night.
sentences.chinese: 再也聽不到黑夜裏烏鴉的啼鳴。

sentences.english: Wer reitet so sp(a:)t durch Nacht und Wind?
sentences.chinese: 這樣遲誰在黑夜和風中奔馳？

sentences.english: Essence of winter sleep is on the night.
sentences.chinese: 冬日睡眠的凝香已滲入黑夜。

sentences.english: Desire not the night, when people are cut off in their place.
sentences.chinese: 不要切慕黑夜，就是衆民在本處被除滅的時候。

sentences.english: Your hearts know in silence the secrets of the days and the nights.
sentences.chinese: 你們的心靈在沉默中獲知白晝黑夜的祕密。

sentences.english: It's almost like night & day as you enter into your highest  astrological cycle...
sentences.chinese: 你進入最高的星運週期，就像黑夜後的白天一般。

sentences.english: In the night without star and moon my dream most.
sentences.chinese: 無月無星的黑夜裏我的夢最多。

sentences.english: The afternoon went by;little grains of darkness sifted down.
sentences.chinese: 一個下午就這麼過去，黑夜的紗幕垂了下來。

sentences.english: Our planet rotates on its axis, creating cycles of day and night.
sentences.chinese: 地球斗轉星移，形成周期的白天和黑夜。

sentences.english: And in this labyrinth where night is blind.
sentences.chinese: 在這連黑夜也目盲的迷宮中。

sentences.english: And see the brave day sunk in hideous night.

definition: night scene/the dim light of night
long dark night/fig. long period of misery and oppression

pinyin: shen1 shou3 bu4 jian4 wu3 zhi3
